sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Less package contains the less program

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The less program is a file pager (or text viewer). It displays the contents of a file with the ability to scroll. Less is an improvement on the common pager called more. Less has the ability to scroll backwards through files as well and it doesn't need to read the entire file when it starts, which makes it faster when reading large files.
